column4: I do not get any sound with OSS in wine? Do I have to do any adjustments in order to get it to work? I have setup OSS as the soundriver in winecfg
you might need to modprobe snd_seq and/or snd_seq_oss
Sorry for being a newbie, but how do I do that? :)
in a terminal type "sudo modprobe snd_seq" repeat for snd_seq_oss. it might work, it might not. for me it worked
